Get all active measurements grouped by PersonId with DressTypes as CSV. Searches by Customer Name.
get.summary: Get all active measurements grouped by PersonId

parameters.description: search by Customer Name (returns all Persons of that customer)
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get measurement histories by measurement id
get.summary: Get measurement histories by measurement id

put.description: Updates an array of measurements by their IDs

post.description: Saves multiple measurements for multiple persons in bulk

put.description: Updates a single measurement by its ID

get.description: Refresh JWT Token and switches the user to the requested channel

channelId.description:
Channel Id must be create only since it will interfere with update operations
Use tx.Exec as raw query to update the channelId as done in channel after-create hook

x-enum-comments.ADMIN: to be used by the application administrator
x-enum-comments.DEV: to be used by developer, only read access in PROD
x-enum-comments.SUPERADMIN: to be used for the owner of the application (customer)
x-enum-comments.SYSTEM_ADMIN: to be used for managing system only,not exposed

Use tx.Exec as raw query to update the channelId as done in channel after-create hook

Channel Id must be create only since it will interfere with update operations
Use tx.Exec as raw query to update the channelId as done in channel after-create hook

x-enum-comments.INVALID: Invalid operation for this type of item.
x-enum-comments.IO: External I/O error such as network failure.
x-enum-comments.OTHER: Unclassified error. This value is not printed in the error message.

orderQuantity.description: sum of quantity from order items
